alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:03PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Erie and northeastern Crawford Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 303 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Union City to near Waterford. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Wattsburg, Riceville, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Hydetown, Mill Village, Spartansburg and Elgin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
